question_text: Which of the following is a key reason for using a structured punchdown panel with good cable management in an enterprise setting?
answer_options: It enables seamless switching between VGA and HDMI
It ensures long-term maintainability and scalability of the network
correct_answer: It ensures long-term maintainability and scalability of the network
explanation: Structured punchdown systems with clear labeling and neat routing make it easier to manage changes and expansions.
